snippet: Among the environmental artworks spilling out of Chelsea galleries this month, Sarah Oppenheimer’s “D-33” is definitely the most restrained and arguably the best.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews works by Sarah Oppenheimer at PPOW gallery.
lead_paragraph: Among the environmental artworks spilling out of Chelsea galleries this month, Sarah Oppenheimer’s “D-33” is definitely the most restrained and arguably the best.
